attributes.action: STOP the continuing Age Discrimination when applying for jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alot of employers are still finding ways not to employ older people. I have been asked various questions so they can assess my age ie what year I left school.Or 'I spose you will be retired in 5yrs time' - instead of 'where do you see yourself in 5 yrs.I know ime far from the only one. I am 54 and need to work for another 10yrs at least.
